verses.verse: "Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and take<WH3947> of them rods,<WH4294> one for each fathers<WH1>' house,<WH1004> of all their princes<WH5387> according to their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004> twelve<WH8147> rods:<WH4294> write<WH3789> every man<WH376>'s name<WH8034> on his rod.<WH4294>
You shall write<WH3789> Aaron<WH175>'s name<WH8034> on the rod<WH4294> of Levi;<WH3878> for there shall be one<WH259> rod<WH4294> for each head<WH7218> of their fathers<WH1>' houses.<WH1004>
You shall lay them up<WH3240> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> before<WH6440> the testimony,<WH5715> where I meet with you.<WH3259>

It shall happen,<WH4294> that the rod of the man<WH376> whom I shall choose<WH977> shall bud:<WH6524> and I will make to cease<WH7918> from me the murmurings<WH8519> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which they murmur against you.<WH3885>"

Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> and all their princes<WH5387> gave<WH5414> him rods,<WH4294> for each prince<WH5387> one,<WH259> according to their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004> even twelve<WH6240> rods:<WH4294> and the rod<WH4294> of Aaron<WH175> was among<WH8432> their rods.<WH4294>
Moses<WH4872> laid up<WH3240> the rods<WH4294> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> in the tent<WH168> of the testimony.<WH5715>

It happened on the next day,<WH4283> that Moses<WH4872> went<WH935> into the tent<WH168> of the testimony;<WH5715> and behold,<WH4294> the rod of Aaron<WH175> for the house<WH1004> of Levi<WH3878> was budded,<WH6524> and put forth<WH3318> buds,<WH6525> and produced<WH6692> blossoms,<WH6731> and bore<WH1580> ripe almonds.<WH8247>

Moses<WH4872> brought out<WH3318> all the rods<WH4294> from before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> to all the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> and they looked,<WH7200> and took<WH3947> every man<WH376> his rod.<WH4294>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Put<WH7725> back<WH7725> the rod<WH4294> of Aaron<WH175> before<WH6440> the testimony,<WH5715> to be kept<WH4931> for a token<WH226> against the children of rebellion;<WH4805> that you may make an end<WH3615> of their murmurings<WH8519> against me,<WH4191> that they not die."
Moses<WH4872> did<WH6213> so.<WH3068> As Yahweh commanded<WH6680> him,<WH6213> so he did.
The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559> "Behold,<WH1478> we perish! We are undone!<WH6> We are all undone!<WH6>
Everyone who comes near,<WH7131> who comes near to the tabernacle<WH4908> of Yahweh,<WH3068> dies!<WH4191> Will we all<WH8552> perish?<WH1478>"
